The LNCM box provides a low cost platform for lightning transactions. This system is open for anyone to use and build on top of, particularly suited to facilitate retail PoS transactions, micropayments, IoT with pay-per-use billing models and countless other exciting possibilities.

We have partnerships with organizations that are eager to adopt the platform and help shape the development of this exciting new technology. For inquiries, please contact us at lncm@protonmail.com

To stay up to date with development, feel free to follow @lncnx on Twitter.
